comment.author: 94494254@N00
comment._content: A note to Daisy R-  clothes were washed by hand and not nearly as often as we do now.  It was a huge production with the mangle for wringing out the clothes and then special presses for ironing after they had dried on the line.  As for the hairdo, I wore a very similar one for my wedding- It took almost 2 hours to get it back to normal afterward. ( my hair was hip length at the time.)

comment.author: 9182891@N03
comment._content: Thank You Music maker..they do have a harder times then compared now when it comes to house keeping & personal grooming.Not being able to change clothes daily can be punishing for we get to used new clean& easy to manage clothes now(hahaha).They looked nice though Romantic look yet Uncomfortable.
